title: Jundy Maraon
text:
Jundy Maraon (born 25 February 1985) also known as "<a href="batang%20gwaping">batang gwaping</a>" is a <a href="Philippines">Filipino</a> professional <a href="Boxing">boxer</a>.
He was WBO Asia Pacific bantamweight champion and resides in <a href="Blancia%20St.%20Molave">Blancia St. Molave</a>, <a href="Zamboanga%20del%20Sur">Zamboanga del Sur</a>. He's married to Naomie Maraon in Talisay City, Cebu last June 9, 2011.
Boxing career.
Maraon made his professional debut on 26 July 2003, defeating Rogelio Oro at <a href="Ipil%2C%20Zamboanga%20Sibugay">Ipil, Zamboanga Sibugay</a>, Philippines.
